Package javax.security.auth.message.callback

This package defines callback interfaces that may be used by a pluggable message authentication module to interact with the message processing runtime that invoked the module.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PrivateKeyCallback.Request Marker interface for private key request types.
SecretKeyCallback.Request Marker interface for secret key request types.
 

Class Summary
CallerPrincipalCallback Callback for setting the container's caller (or Remote user) principal.
CertStoreCallback Callback for CertStore.
GroupPrincipalCallback Callback establishing group principals within the argument subject.
PasswordValidationCallback Callback for PasswordValidation.
PrivateKeyCallback Callback for acquiring a Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) private key and its corresponding certificate chain.
PrivateKeyCallback.AliasRequest Request type for private keys that are identified using an alias.
PrivateKeyCallback.DigestRequest Request type for private keys that are identified using a certificate digest or thumbprint.
PrivateKeyCallback.IssuerSerialNumRequest Request type for private keys that are identified using an issuer/serial number.
PrivateKeyCallback.SubjectKeyIDRequest Request type for private keys that are identified using a SubjectKeyID
SecretKeyCallback Callback for acquiring a shared secret from a key repository.
SecretKeyCallback.AliasRequest Request type for secret keys that are identified using an alias.
TrustStoreCallback Callback for trusted certificate KeyStore.
 

Package javax.security.auth.message.callback Description

This package defines callback interfaces that may be used by a pluggable message authentication module to interact with the message processing runtime that invoked the module.
